Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
